content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and my latest action was to browse the Columbia Law School website for legal research resources, which did not provide direct information. Then, I used the "google" command to search for legal research resources and received a list of websites from my computer.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://guides.library.harvard.edu/law/free", "question": "What are some free legal research resources?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a guide to free legal research resources in the United States, including federal and state law, treaties, case law, court documents, executive documents, secondary sources, and data sources. The guide emphasizes the importance of combining paid and free resources for effective legal research and provides links to various online sources. It also suggests visiting local law libraries for additional resources and tools such as citators for case validation.\n\nLinks: ['Skip to Main Content (https://guides.library.harvard.edu/law/free#s-lg-guide-main)', ' (https://hls.harvard.edu/library)', 'Hours (https://hls.harvard.edu/library/about-the-library/library-hours/)', 'Ask a Librarian (http://asklib.law.harvard.edu/)', 'HLS (http://law.harvard.edu/index.html)']", type='action_result')]
"""
